title: Racing teams of NASCAR ranked by revenue 2017
summary: This is a bar chart representing Teams in the x axis and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Teams Hendrick Motorsports has the highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars and Front Row Motorsports has the lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars of Teams Hendrick Motorsports is 9.47% larger than the minimum value at Front Row Motorsports.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Teams in the x axis and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Teams Hendrick Motorsports and lowest at Teams Front Row Motorsports.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Teams in the x axis and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Teams Hendrick Motorsports has the highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars and Front Row Motorsports has the lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars of Teams Hendrick Motorsports is 9.47% larger than the minimum value at Front Row Motorsports.
max_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Teams, and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Teams on the y axis.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Teams Hendrick Motorsports and lowest at Teams Front Row Motorsports.
Teams Richard Childress Racing has the second highest value for Revenue in million U.S. dollars.
The difference of Revenue in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Teams is 161.0.

The Teams Hendrick Motorsports has the highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, followed by Richard Childress Racing, and Joe Gibbs Racing. Down to the Teams Front Row Motorsports which is the lowest.
The highest value 180.0 at Hendrick Motorsports is almost 1.82 times larger than the average value 99.12.
